code: import{LayoutActionTypes}from'./constants';export var changeLayout=function changeLayout(layout){return{type:LayoutActionTypes.CHANGE_LAYOUT,payload:layout};};export var changeLayoutColor=function changeLayoutColor(color){return{type:LayoutActionTypes.CHANGE_LAYOUT_COLOR,payload:color};};export var changeLayoutWidth=function changeLayoutWidth(width){return{type:LayoutActionTypes.CHANGE_LAYOUT_WIDTH,payload:width};};export var changeSidebarTheme=function changeSidebarTheme(theme){return{type:LayoutActionTypes.CHANGE_SIDEBAR_THEME,payload:theme};};export var changeSidebarType=function changeSidebarType(sidebarType){return{type:LayoutActionTypes.CHANGE_SIDEBAR_TYPE,payload:sidebarType};};export var showRightSidebar=function showRightSidebar(){return{type:LayoutActionTypes.SHOW_RIGHT_SIDEBAR,payload:null};};export var hideRightSidebar=function hideRightSidebar(){return{type:LayoutActionTypes.HIDE_RIGHT_SIDEBAR,payload:null};};
